author: crazycrisplego
title: THE FINAL BATTLE EQAULS BEST SET EVER!
review:
Got this and cragger crocs headquaters for christmas this is ten times better a set for a true ninjago fan!

Pros:

  • BRILLANT MININFIGURES BEST ONE IS GOLD NINJA
  • NICE DESIGNED TEMPLE
  • RARE AND EPIC GOLDEN ROBOT!

Cons

  • sensi should have a new suit
  • NO OTHER CON SET BRILLANT
  • …

This set has gold ninja and garmdon in a new suit,a brillant designed temple and epic golden robot what more could any one want this set gets a defent ten out of ten this set is brillant i hope you have as much fun playing with it as me.

by Anthony crazycrisplego's brother

BYE NINJAGO FANS

author: ant1234lego
title: THE FINAL BATTLE LYOD VS GARMDON
review:
TEMPLE OF LIGHT

Out of 30 each paragraph can get 10 marks at highest and 1 lowest.

First we have the temple.

THE TEMPLE

The temple is the main part where Lloyd fights his father – the walls are decorated with dragon designs with a flame in the middle of the ground floor and a sticker of Sensei Wu. It also has two circular towers with mini gold dragons at the top. The temple also features a holder for the elemental blades and a really cool trap door. (Tip) Between the two towers there is a mini roof to fight on. The temple definitely deserves a strong 10.

MINIFIGURES

Best part of the set is the figures. First we have the best figure - the gold ninja. It also comes in the Golden Dragon set, but still a brilliant figure. Then we have Lord Garmdon: he has a cool new weapon - a piece that goes around his mask and instead of a bone he has a red piece and the same piece on his staff. Next we have Sensei – this is the worst figure in this set; he should have had a new suit! Next we have a scout to add to your army and then we have a Stone Army Warrior, which is a nice stone figure, better than the scout, the total score for the figures  is a cool 10!

GOLDEN MECH

The Golden Mech unlike all the other Mechs that usually fall apart and are really fragile, this one stands perfectly if you build it properly and Lloyd figure fits in perfectly. I give it a perfect 10!

OVERALL!

Overall this set scored a phenomenal 30 out 30 FULL MARKS! I would definitely recommend this set to anyone.
